name: My Master's Birthday
description:
My Master's Birthday is a short kinetic novel style game I made in about 3 weeks in RPG Maker VX Ace for halloween. 

you play as a werewolf butler named Damien. it's October 31st, and he wants to impress his master, Victoria, by buying her her favorite foods for her birthday! it's linear with only one ending, and it's VERY short. you could beat it in about 15 minutes.

very minor amount of blood and foul language, but that's about it.
